title: Games That Make Us Go AHHH!
description: It's October so it must be time to give you the straight up willies. The Besties dive into Twitch phenomenon Phasmophobia, and Justin burns matches in Amnesia: Rebirth. We also explore some of our favorite scary games from throughout history. Join us ... unless you're scared? To be honest, we kinda are.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
